Exponential Mechanism.description: The Exponential mechanism selects outputs with probabilities proportional to their utility while ensuring differential privacy.
Exponential Mechanism.use_case: Used in settings where a set of possible discrete outputs is available, primarily for categorical data.

file.description: The input CSV file containing the tabular data to be anonymized.

column_to_be_anonymized.description: The name of the column with categorical data that requires anonymization.

direct_identifier_columns.description: A list of columns that serve as direct identifiers.

sensitivity.description: The sensitivity of the query, representing the maximum change in the output caused by the inclusion or exclusion of a single record.

epsilon.description: Privacy budget that controls the level of noise added.
